txt.en: Illuminated Chronicle of Cirion and Eorl[n]

An illuminating  historical chronicle telling the story of the meeting of Cirion and Eorl and their subsequent alliance.\n\nThe Scholar's Guild leader will accept this in exchange for a Sealed Westemnet Device of Battle, Accuracy, Tactics, Insight, Protection or Potency.
Illuminated Chronicle of Cirion and Eorl[n]
